entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 70%
